startMessage: Use the '+' button to create a {{n}} notification list.
notice: Click on the 'add' button to create a notification list.
noNotifications: You have no notification list yet.
stepOneTip: Choose an 'Addressee Layer' and give it a label.
stepTwoTip: Choose an area/location using the 'Search' tool or click on a location in the map.
stepThreeTip: Refine your search using the 'Select' or 'Search Distance' tools.
stepTwoFullSearchTip: Search for an address, place, or feature for selection.
stepTwoFullLayerTip: Use draw tools to select features from an existing layer.
stepTwoFullSketchTip: Select features from the addressee layer using sketch tools.
stepOptional: Optionally use search distance and provide a list name.
refineTip: Add or remove features to refine and finalize the selection using the sketch tools.
